name: All For One
text: When All For One enters the battlefield, you may choose any number of target creatures, planeswalkers and/or artifacts on the battlefield and put a -1/-1 counter on each of them. For each counter you put this way, you may search your library for a card with a casting cost equal to or less than the number of -1/-1 counters on that permanent, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
